name: calcom_get_available_slots
description: Get available time slots for a specific event type. Use this to show available booking times to users. If an event type has been provided to you in the system prompt use it.

event_type_id.description: The ID of the event type to get available slots for. Only ask for this if absolutely necessary.

start.description: Time starting from which available slots should be checked.Must be in UTC timezone as ISO 8601 date string.You can pass a date without hours, which defaults to the start of day, or specify hours:Example: '2024-08-13' (will have hours 00:00:00, i.e., at the very beginning of the date),or specify hours manually like '2024-08-13T09:00:00Z'.If this value is not in the future the API will return a 404.

end.description: Time until which available slots should be checked.Must be in UTC timezone as ISO 8601 date string.You can pass a date without hours, which defaults to end of day, or specify hours:Example: '2024-08-20' (will have hours 23:59:59, i.e., at the very end of the date),or specify hours manually like '2024-08-20T18:00:00Z'.
